name: I'm on a watcher duty 3: The invasion
name_original: I'm on a watcher duty 3: The invasion
description:
Another sequel of "I'm on a watcher duty" series. This one is in the theme of the hand-made maps made by me. Enjoy.

MMD Model credits:

montecore - Rumia model

すけ - Flandre Model

えと - Cirno model

Ki - Reisen and Nitori model

Udon Neko - Orin model

なす天 - Tewi model

Other credits:

Paulor94 - Main creator of this fangame

Notovia (Zaster) - Original creator of "I'm on observation duty"

Abc-Guy - Made a gamepage thumbnail

This game was made with a bunch of Unity free assets so most assets aren't belongs to me. All credits for the model go to their respective owners. (There's too many of them so I can't list them here. Sorry.)

Some picture in the painting are from Google.
